recipes.title: Stuffed Avocado
ingredients: 1 small ripe tomato, cut into 1/4-inch dice
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
recipes.instructions: Halve avocado lengthwise, and remove the pit. Top each half with tomato and feta. Drizzle with lemon juice, and garnish with chives and pumpkin seeds. Season with salt and pepper, and serve.

recipes.title: Butternut Squash Soup
ingredients: 1 butternut squash peeled and diced into cubes
recipes.instructions: In a dutch oven pot (or heavy pot), heat olive oil over medium heat. Add onion and garlic. cook until softened, about 5 minutes. Add cut up butternut squash and vegetable broth. Bring to a boil then cover and simmer for 15-20 minutes until squash is softened. Carefully pour entire contents of pot into blender (I use my Vitamix). Add salt. Carefully blend until smooth. Serve in bowls with thyme, feta crumbles and pinenuts if desired. Enjoy!

recipes.title: Mint, Strawberry and Goat Cheese Salad
ingredients: ½ tsp freshly ground black pepper
recipes.instructions: For the salad: Gently toss spinach, strawberries, almonds, and mint in a large bowl. Crumble goat cheese over salad, and pour over balsamic vinaigrette to taste. Serve within 1-2 hours of preparation. For the dressing: Whisk all ingredients except for olive oil together in a small bowl until salt is dissolved. Slowly pour olive oil until fully combined.

recipes.title: Veggie Hummus Pita Sandwich
recipes.instructions: Cut pita pocket in half lengthwise to expose the inner pocket. Liberally slather hummus inside each pocket, then top with remaining ingredients. Ensure they are spread out for even coverage. Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Mixed Berry Smoothie
ingredients: 1 1/2 cups apple juice can also use almond milk, skim milk, coconut milk or other flavor of juice
Optional garnish: fresh berries and mint sprigs
recipes.instructions: Place the apple juice, banana, berries and yogurt in a blender; blend until smooth. If the smoothie seems too thick, add a little more liquid (1/4 cup). Taste and add honey if desired. Pour into two glasses and garnish with fresh berries and mint sprigs if desired.

recipes.title: Mango Smoothie
ingredients: 2 fresh mangoes or 2 cups of frozen mango
1 small frozen banana (or half of a large banana) you can use unfrozen if using frozen mango
½ cup milk dairy or dairy-free
½ cup yogurt dairy or dairy-free
recipes.instructions: Add all ingredients to a high-powered blender and blend until creamy.

recipes.title: Veggie Pasta Salad
recipes.instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions to al dente but do not season water with salt (the dressing has plenty). Drain and rinse under cold water. Pour pasta into a bowl, add tomatoes, broccoli, bell pepper, olives, cucumber, carrots, red onion and parmesan. Pour dressing over and toss to evenly coat. Cover and chill at least 30 minutes (or up to 1 day). Add a little more dressing if needed.

recipes.title: Chia Seed Pudding
ingredients: 1/2 cup almond milk or milk of choice
1 teaspoon honey or other sweetener, optional
Raspberries or other fruits for topping
recipes.instructions: Pour ingredients into a jar and mix well. Let settle for 2-3 minutes then mix again very well until you see no clumping. Cover the jar and store in fridge overnight or for at least 2 hours. When you’re ready to eat it, top with your favorite fruit and enjoy cold!

recipes.title: Tomato, Mozzarella and Pesto Sandwich
ingredients: Ciabatta roll, wheat bread or bread of your choice
recipes.instructions: Spread some pesto on the cut side of both halves of each ciabatta roll. Lay a thick slice of mozzarella on the bottom halves, followed by a thick slice of tomato. Top with the other ciabatta halves and serve immediately!

recipes.title: French Toast
recipes.instructions: Beat egg, vanilla and cinnamon in shallow dish with wire whisk. Stir in milk. Dip bread in egg mixture, turning to coat both sides evenly. Cook bread slices on lightly greased nonstick griddle or skillet on medium heat until browned on both sides. Serve with syrup and fruit of your choice
